segments.text: My heart races as I see the water pooling on the floor.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It’s such a simple mistake, yet it feels monumental in this moment.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The thought of someone slipping fills me with dread; will they be hurt?
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can’t take my eyes off the scene unfolding before me, filled with tension.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It’s maddening to think about how easily this could have been avoided.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Every detail heightens my anxiety – the water, the children, their secret mission.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I just wish someone would take a moment to acknowledge the chaos.
segments.speaker: PAR
